main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Miamisburg, Ohio on 22 August 1966, involving one bright light observed for about 20 minutes.
interesting points: The object was brighter than the brightest star and was traveling towards the Northeast,The sighting was reported by three witnesses,The object was consistent with that of a satellite sighting,There was no physical evidence or photograph included in the report,The survey collected detailed information about the sighting.
